additionalActions.description: Additional actions for inline clipboard copy. Should be wrapped with ClipboardCopyAction. (React component or element)

children.description: The text which is copied. (Type: string | string[])

className.description: Additional classes added to the clipboard copy container.

clickTip.description: Tooltip message to display when clicking the copy button

entryDelay.description: Delay in ms before the tooltip appears.

exitDelay.description: Delay in ms before the tooltip disappears.

hoverTip.description: Tooltip message to display when hover the copy button

isBlock.description: Flag to determine if inline clipboard copy should be block styling

isCode.description: Flag to determine if clipboard copy content includes code

isExpanded.description: Flag to determine if clipboard copy is in the expanded state initially

isReadOnly.description: Flag to show if the input is read only.

onChange.description: A function that is triggered on changing the text. (Function: (event: React.FormEvent, text?: string) => void)

onCopy.description: A function that is triggered on clicking the copy button. This will replace the existing clipboard copy functionality entirely. (React component or element)

ouiaId.description: Value to overwrite the randomly generated data-ouia-component-id. (Type: number | string)

ouiaSafe.description: Set the value of data-ouia-safe. Only set to true when the component is in a static state, i.e. no animations are occurring. At all other times, this value must be false.

textAriaLabel.description: Aria-label to use on the TextInput.

toggleAriaLabel.description: Aria-label to use on the ClipboardCopyToggle.

truncation.description: Enables and customizes truncation for an inline-compact ClipboardCopy.
